parameters.query:
select input4.matricula
  , input4.empresa
  , COALESCE(input1.data_admissao, '{{ $now.minus(6, 'months').format('yyyy-LL-dd') }}') as data_admissao
  , input4.cargo
  , input4.situacao
  , input9.sindicato
  , input9.sindicato_uf
  , input9.valor_vr_dia
  , input9.dias_uteis
  , '{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.Competencia }}' as competencia
from input4 
left join input1 on input4.matricula = input1.matricula
left join input5 on input4.matricula = input5.matricula
inner join input9 on input4.sindicato = input9.sindicato_uf

fieldValues.fieldValue: ={{ $json.SINDICATO_UF == "S√£o Paulo" ? "SP" : $json.SINDICATO_UF == "Rio Grande do Sul" ? "RS" : $json.SINDICATO_UF == "Rio de Janeiro" ? "RJ" : "PR" }}
